"Oh no, not at all! On the contrary, I am very glad to make your acquaintance," said Pierre. And again, glancing at the stranger's hands, he looked more closely at the ring, with its skulla Masonic sign. 
"Allow me to ask," he said, "are you a Ma- son?" 
"Yes, I belong to the Brotherhood of the Freemasons," said the stranger, looking deep- er and deeper into Pierre's eyes. "And in their name and my own I hold out a brotherly hand to you."
